channel.title: NPC clipping
channel.description:
Heey guys well I'm on a pi base and It's up and running but theres still one problem, the npc's can uhm "no-clip" if you will such as when your are ranging through a wall or something the npc will follow you, and I cant seem to figure out how to prevent that it would be greatly apreciated if atleast someone could help me out here
thanks, Burntoath :D
